website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy impact bag is outfitted with an anchor clip, so you can clip it down if you're concerned it might take flight in your practice space.
pros: Allows you to develop better endurance, technique, rhythm, consistency and distance
Fill with towels, clothes, sheets or any cloth-type material
Use to practice for return to golf after injury
Has a clip to secure it to something sturdy if you don't want it to move far when you hit it
cons: Consider using outdoors or using ear protection indoors

customer_reviews.title: Low quality ripped at seam disappointed golfer
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag lightly once a week or every two weeks and to my dismay its torn at the seam. See picture. I would like the seller to send me a replacement one free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Hiep Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Seam ripped after first use
customer_reviews.text: The seam ripped after the first session. Does it’s job, but held together with duct tape now 😔
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile Practice Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly, as described. Zipper works. No defects. Great way to practice without actually hitting balls. Easy to stake down. I stuffed it with a couple of moving blankets to make it heavier than if I'd just used sheets or towels, which gave the back a more solid feel. Seems durable but I would recommend turning it occasionally so your club is not always impacting the same spot. A worthwhile gift or purchase for the golfer who likes to practice in the off season or between trips to the range.
customer_reviews.author: Lives2read

customer_reviews.title: Works well as an impact bag, but I may be getting repetition of bad habits
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind this bag is great. Unfortunately, I don't know if I'm repeating good habits or bad ones while hitting the bag. I would rather go play golf or go to the range and get an idea of the actual ball flight. I've used this bag with a video camera to try to see if my swing looks good. If you are looking for an impact bag, it seems to be made solidly and has held up fine during the times I use it. I would prefer something that can give feedback so I know if I'm doing something wrong, but I'm okay with this in between trips to the course or range.
customer_reviews.author: W. Simpsen

customer_reviews.title: Whack-an-Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty well put together. It doesn't seem like it'll fall apart any time soon. It features a small plastic clip on the bottom edge that you're supposed to put over a stake -- if you don't hit the bag straight on, it should spin around the stake. The clip is kinda small, so it's a bit limiting. A ground spike from another sports net should work. I don't know how long that clip will last, though. Of course, you don't want to hit this thing at full power, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Good practice tool for mimicking impact!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple concept but helps a lot when trying to mimick the impact of the golf ball at impact. You want to feel as if you’re striking downward and into the ball. The bag comes flat upon delivery but then you just stuff it with towels and sheets. Then you can swing away at the bag but at less than 75% of your swing. I thought I would use indoors more but I didn’t realize how loud the impact was. Now I’m just using it outside. If you’re an avid golfer then this is a worth addition to your practice tools!
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool, durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting one of these for a while. This comes very well packed in a flat box. To use it you need to fill it with some heavy towels, or some heavy clothes. I used old beach towels. This is good for practicing your swing indoors, or during the winter. It makes a loud thump when you hit it, but it takes the hit. It’s holding up well. This would make a great gift for any golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

customer_reviews.title: Good to have if you have the room to use it.
customer_reviews.text: You need A LOT of rags and towels to fill this up properly and you need A LOT of clear room and high ceiling in the house to take a full swing and really practice in the winter. We are fortunate to be able to do so. But all that being said, this is a good way to work on your swing and improve even when there is snow on the ground or it is too windy, etc. to practice outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Graham

customer_reviews.title: Help for keeping golfers in the swing of things
customer_reviews.text: Sn;ow is beginning to fall in my state and this is a good item for golfers to have wo they can keep practicing their swing wihen the outside weather is prohibitibe. It's easy to set up and use. This also works as a good gift idea for any golfers on your list. It's priced well and I'd say that all systems are go for getting this for yourself or someone on your gift list.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice product to keep swing alive
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for keeping my swing alive in winter. I live in Minnesota so i setup a spot in the garage on a piece of turf and swing away. Keeps my swing tight all winter. As i get older i was losing swing speed this is helping keep my speed up.
customer_reviews.author: gtklein

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice concept and works. The bag is well made and thick. It very much hits well. It helped me get my steady rhythm while swinging and has improved my game. It also is great for teaching my kiddos how to swing and hit the ball properly. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good for winter and home practice swings.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for practicing golf swings at home. It feels sturdy and is just the right size. Since it came unstuffed, I filled it with towels and sheets which means this works as an extra storage for me.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made, and proven to be indestructible after months of use. The material is thick, holds its shape well, easy to clean, and very resilient. It has lasted through everything we have put it through still looking as new, and has provided storage space in a college dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up to 3 half swings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to help strengthen my right hand. followed the instructions on how to fill it, anchor it into the ground and not swing at 100%. Set myself to practice. Using my right hand only, took 3 half (50%) swings, the seams by the ground anchor tore.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: not stuffed
customer_reviews.text: Like most: Feels durable and the right size. Could take a few strikes at it but worried that it will not hold.. We will see.. Like least: That it does not come stuffed already. It took approx 5 tablecloths and a few napkins in it. I received this for my honest opinion and was not compensated.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

product_meta.title: Intech Golf Swing Impact Bag
product_meta.description: Practicing with the Intech golf impact bag for just 15 minutes a day can help you develop better Rhythm, technique, endurance, consistency and distance, while encouraging muscle memory and a flat left wrist (for a RH golfer) at impact for on-target shots. This can be used to help winterize your game in the off-season or during the season it can provide same quality practice time at home as hitting countless balls at the range. Easy set-up: fill with towels, clothes, sheets or any cloth-type material through the zippered opening, zip it up and you are ready to practice. Use at home or out on the range and it is safe to use for your golf clubs. Product dimensions: 15" diameter x 10" high.
feature_bullets: Impact bag helps develop better rhythm, technique, endurance, consistency and distance while encouraging muscle memory
Heavy-duty construction - fill with towels, clothes, sheets or any cloth-type material
Use at home to provide same quality practice time as hitting countless balls at the range
Safe to Use for your golf clubs and low stress on your body - remember swing no more than 75% of your natural swing and never swing at 100%
Countless uses - one of the most popular golf training aids and easy to Use
